1221111.content:
You look to your left and your right in a blind panic. This just can't be happening! This is impossible! You see her toes rise up and down in anticipation through her gray socks. Finally, you look up at her beaming face.

"So, you're gonna tell your parents, hmm? Well, I can't have that. Maybe I should just...remove the evidence. But I'll make this easy for you." She raises her colossal foot above you. You stare, mesmerized, at the sole of her socked foot, only dimly aware of the unstoppable fear coursing through your body.

"Lay down. Accept the fact that I'm going to step on you and there's nothing you can do about it. If you try to fight my foot, it'll hurt a lot more, and you'll still be squished underfoot."

You look up at her, this menacing figure, hovering her foot just a few feet above you.

"Whatever you're gonna do, you better do it quick." she says. "My leg's getting tired..."

She slowly begins to lower her foot. You are way too scared to even move. You were lucky that you even heard her over your fear. You feel the fabric of her sock touch the top of your head, and the flesh of her sole behind it.

"Time's up, Timmy." she says. "Oh, well. I think I should let you know that I had fun." you hear a giggle far above you, and despair surges through you. You fall to your knees and begin crying, feeling her foot now resting on your back, covering your entire body. "Aw, now that's more like it." she says. "Even though it won't do anything, you should worship me. I am your Goddess, Timmy, and you are my sacrifice."

You look up slowly, increasing the pain on your back, but enabling you to see her face. You can just barely see it beyond her heel resting on the top of your head. The pressure on your back increases as she bends down to get a closer look at you.

"And you know what? I'm gonna do exactly the same thing to your parents. When they come home, I'm gonna shrink them. I think I'll eat your mom...she looked pretty tasty. Your dad, however...he gets to share the fate of his son. Like father..." she began, slowly increasing the pressure.

"Like son!" she yelled, and your entire vision compressed down as every bone in your body simultaenously shattered into dust. For a split second, you can see the fabric of her sock touch the floor, and you barely have time to form one last tear before you are crushed underneath the foot of your babysitter.

-----

It was a long weekend for Amy...but it was all worth it when Timmy's parents walked into the door. They never even knew what hit them when they were shrunk. Amy kept her promise to Timmy.

He was nearly knocked off his feet when Emma finally stepped over the threshold into their house. Immediately he was flung toward her toes as she walked farther into the house. The constant motion seemed to wedge him in between her toes, each step pushing him farther in. Eventually he found himself enveloped, his body coated with sweat. Then he felt everything stop, and the floor give out from under him as Emma kicked of her sandals. Despite her feet no longer being confined to the sandals, Timmy still found himself stuck fast as she walked toward the stairs.
"Timmy" she called upstairs "you up there?" She waited for a response, then shrugged her shoulders " Mom and Dad must have dropped him off at a babysitters or something" she turned and went back into the living room. Grabbing the remote of the coffee table and plopped down on the sofa. Flicking on the T.V she swung her legs up and laid across the chair. She sat back and lazily flicked through the channels every once in awhile wiggling her toes back and Forth.
Timmy was being pushed and pulled every time Emma's toes moved. The thick coat of sweat that covered his body kept him lubricated enough, to prevent him from being ground to a pulp by his sister gargantuan toes. Each time her toe passed over him self sliding back and forth, giving him an idea. He used the momentum of he toes he tried to wiggle himself out of his prison. His plan seemed to be working as he managed to inch himself closer and closer to freedom. With one final push he found himself shoot out her her toes and onto the soft sofa cushion. Gasping in fresh air, he sat up and wiped his face of any excess sweat. Turning toward his former prison his breath caught in his throat. There in front of him stood what looked to be more like a mountain than a person. Emma's entire form took up his entire view as he looked across the sofa toward her face. Her long legs seemed to stretch on for miles. As her followed her body up he noticed her rather well developed form, and remembered his mother mentioning something about her being very popular around school. Her head was propped up on her hand as she flicked through the channels, unaware of his presence. Taking a deep breath he yelled out to her "Emma please look, it's me Timmy!" Sighing he ran toward her in an attempt to get her attention, coming up the arm her followed it up to look at her massive face. and began beating his hands on it, hoping to get a response. He looked up toward her face, and was dismayed to see she did'nt even notice him. The only answer he received was a couple of low gurgles that emanated from within her stomach.
